text: Songzhu () is a railway station on the TRA Taichung line located in Beitun District, Taichung, Taiwan. It opened on 18 October 2018. A metro station operated by Taichung Metro on the Green Line is currently under construction. The two stations will be connected by an out-of-station transfer. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Taiwan ==References== Category:2018 establishments in Taiwan Category:Railway stations in Taichung Category:Railway stations opened in 2018 Category:Railway stations served by Taiwan Railways Administration
title: Songzhu station
